IMOD 2.41 Starting Points

To start out, read the IMOD users guide. It contains instructions for installing IMOD and importing data into imod.
  • The IMOD home page.
  • Download IMOD and sample data sets.
  • The IMOD online users guide for the latest up to date information.
  • Register IMOD and help us continue work on this project.
  • Give us feedback.
  • Report IMOD bugs.
  • Read the Copyright and credits notice.
